AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ash yam masher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had always longed for one particular thing, potatoes, which proved somewhat difficult to obtain in Vvardenfell. [PAWN_pronoun] just wanted to feel them crumble beneath [PAWN_possessive] fists, to hear them cry out in pain as their life was extinguished, to smell their essence leave their shapeless forms. Sadly, ash yams would have to do.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Arnesian War veteran
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many brave Dunmer who fought in the Arnesian War. [PAWN_pronoun] was one of many who heroically stormed Black Marsh. And one of the few left standing in land now belonging to Morrowind. In later days, [PAWN_nameDef] took up gardening, but is still surprisingly quick on [PAWN_possessive] feet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ashlander
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be an ashlander from the Ahemmusa Tribe. [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed living a relatively simple life, where death awaited around every corner. Though [PAWN_pronoun] eventually got sick of all the ash and blight storms, and decided to look for greener pastures, with actual grass.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: trophy hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: There are many great beasts in Morrowind, and [PAWN_nameDef] has hunted them all. On a quest for new challenges, [PAWN_pronoun] set sail to Solstheim. [PAWN_nameDef] hunted everything [PAWN_pronoun] found, from rieklings to grahl, and even an uderfrykte. However there was one elusive beast left on [PAWN_possessive] list, the werewolf.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: mud crab tracker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] set off on a grand adventure, to retrieve [PAWN_pronoun] bottle of vintage greef, which went missing on a stormy night many moons ago.

[PAWN_possessive] neighbour swears they saw a mudcrab wander off with it. Obviously the idea of a mudcrab breaking into ones home, climbing up the stairs, and reaching up to a shelf, all while avoiding making a single sound, is simply preposterous. But maybe there was some truth to it.

On [PAWN_possessive] journey, [PAWN_nameDef] learnt that many others have had bottles of alcohol stolen in the middle of the night. And all of them believe that a mudcrab is the culprit.

So now, [PAWN_nameDef] wanders the ashen wastes, the putrid swamps, and the fungal forest, all in search of that mudcrab.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: reformed degenerate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a filthy degenerate, who would do anything for skooma, even commit murder. While committing a heinous crime [PAWN_possessive] life was almost lost. [PAWN_nameDef] was saved in an act of unexpected kindness. Afterwards, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to commit [PAWN_objective]self to one goal. The protection of the Dunmeri people from a hellish abomination.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dark Brother
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of the Dark Brotherhood, and is one of the few surviving members of the Mournhold chapter. [PAWN_nameDef] remembers that horrific day well, seeing [PAWN_possessive] fellow Dark Brothers fall one after the other, all because some novice failed to deal with an important target.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Silken Ring assassin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Once a member of the Morag Tong, over time [PAWN_nameDef] grew disillusioned with the laws the Tong enforced. Eventually [PAWN_pronoun] was contacted by a former member of the Morag Tong, who had founded a new establishment, and was looking for members to join it.
